snippet: Eric Bogosian will perform at Bank Street Theater Oct. 1-20 as part of the Labyrinth Theater Company’s 2013-14 season.
abstract: Eric Bogosian will perform at Bank Street Theater Oct. 1-20 as part of the Labyrinth Theater Company’s 2013-14 season.

headline.main: 100 Monologues From Bogosian to Kick Off Labyrinth Theater Season
headline.print_headline: Bogosian Monologues To Start Labyrinth Season
